name: PHPaibot
summary: A proactive PHP chatbot that simulates human-like thinking by generating thoughts, maintaining memory, and evolving personality with news-aware emotional intelligence

development_state.notes: Status: Phase 3 In Progress - Profile store, admin controls, UI served from webhook API

goals: Complete feedback loops for continuous learning
Implement long-term relationship memory beyond individual conversations
Create opinion formation based on accumulated news and interactions
Integrate a production LLM/embedding service and disable dev-mock for live runs

tech_stack.notes: Uses remote LLM and embedding endpoints; runs in dev-mock for local testing

api_endpoints.description: Check AI emotional state and topics
View and toggle development mock mode
Serve chat UI from webhook API (same origin)

current_capabilities: Emotional state tracking (-10 to +10 mood scale)
Context-aware conversations using QDRANT semantic search
Proactive engagement with natural conversation flow
next_steps: Complete feedback loops for continuous learning
Implement long-term relationship memory beyond individual conversations
Create opinion formation based on accumulated news and interactions
Integrate a production LLM/embedding service and disable dev-mock for live runs

architecture.overview: Hybrid push/pull chat system with QDRANT vector database, news processing, and emotional state tracking.

conversationalLoop.description: Fast, reactive chat system using QDRANT for semantic search.
conversationalLoop.implementation: Node.js backend handles chat requests, retrieves context from QDRANT, and calls remote LLM.

memorySystem.description: QDRANT vector database for semantic conversation storage and retrieval.
memorySystem.implementation: Stores conversations and news context with embeddings.

infrastructure.notes: Docker Compose with optional QDRANT and external LLM/embedding endpoints.
